Increase conversion rates and let your customers checkout faster by saving and their card data in Stripe.





Integrating with CardList is seamless! Simply send a request to our server with your customer's order details (example shown below), redirect them to our checkout page, and we'll let them checkout with a new card or a payment method they've stored during previous purchases.

Send a POST request to https://cardlist.co/new-order with the following JSON body structure:
